text: Caffè Nero (Italian for black coffee) or Caffè Nero Group Plc is a British coffee shop chain. It was established in 1997 and runs more than 330 shops nationwide. The company successfully dismissed a hostile takeover attempt during the COVID-19 pandemic. ==Other websites== *Official website * Business Week Caffe Nero Article Category:Coffee houses Category:Companies of the United Kingdom Category:1997 establishments in England
title: Caffè Nero
